hostlist.1.name: AdGuard DNS filter
hostlist.1.description: List composed of several filters (AdGuard Base filter, Social Media filter, Tracking Protection filter, Mobile Ads filter, EasyList and EasyPrivacy) and simplified specifically to be better compatible with DNS-level ad blocking

hostlist.3.name: Peter Lowe's Blocklist
hostlist.3.description: Blocklist with hostnames of ad and tracking servers

hostlist.4.name: Dan Pollock's List
hostlist.4.description: List for blocking ads and preventing user tracking

hostlist.5.name: OISD Blocklist Small
hostlist.5.description: List for blocking ads and trackers. Prioritizes functionality over blocking.

hostlist.6.name: Dandelion Sprout's Game Console Adblock List
hostlist.6.description: List for blocking ads on videogame consoles that use AdGuard Home

hostlist.7.name: Perflyst and Dandelion Sprout's Smart-TV Blocklist
hostlist.7.description: List for preventing smart TVs from sending metadata to the vendor, and for blocking ads in apps and movie services

hostlist.8.name: NoCoin Filter List
hostlist.8.description: List for blocking browser-based crypto mining

hostlist.9.name: The Big List of Hacked Malware Web Sites
hostlist.9.description: List of websites that are hacked with malware, ransomware or trojans

hostlist.11.name: Malicious URL Blocklist (URLHaus)
hostlist.11.description: Blocklist of malicious websites based on the Database dump of Abuse.ch URLhaus

hostlist.12.name: Dandelion Sprout's Anti-Malware List
hostlist.12.description: Dandelion Sprout's Anti-Malware List (DNS filtering in AdGuard Home, AdGuard for Android, and AdGuard for Windows)

hostlist.13.name: NOR: Dandelion Sprouts nordiske filtre
hostlist.13.description: Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters (DNS filtering in AdGuard Home, AdGuard for Android, and AdGuard for Windows)

hostlist.15.name: KOR: YousList
hostlist.15.description: List for blocking ads mainly on Korean websites

hostlist.16.name: VNM: ABPVN List
hostlist.16.description: List for blocking ads on Vietnamese websites

hostlist.17.name: SWE: Frellwit's Swedish Hosts File
hostlist.17.description: List for blocking ads, tracking, scams & malware mainly on Swedish websites

hostlist.18.name: Phishing Army
hostlist.18.description: The blocklist to filter phishing domains

hostlist.19.name: IRN: PersianBlocker list
hostlist.19.description: Optimal and extensive list for blocking ads and trackers on Persian language sites

hostlist.20.name: MKD: Macedonian Pi-hole Blocklist
hostlist.20.description: List for blocking ads on Macedonian websites

hostlist.21.name: CHN: anti-AD
hostlist.21.description: List for blocking ads in the Chinese region. Aims at privacy protection.

hostlist.22.name: IDN: ABPindo
hostlist.22.description: Filter complementary to EasyList for blocking ads on Indonesian and Malaysian websites

hostlist.23.name: WindowsSpyBlocker - Hosts spy rules
hostlist.23.description: List for blocking spying and tracking on Windows

hostlist.24.name: 1Hosts (Lite)
hostlist.24.description: List for blocking pesky ads, trackers, and malware. Balanced version: set & forget, doesn't hamper user experience.

hostlist.25.name: KOR: List-KR DNS
hostlist.25.description: A DNS version of List-KR, a filter for websites in the Korean language

hostlist.26.name: TUR: turk-adlist
hostlist.26.description: List for blocking ads and annoying elements on Turkish websites

hostlist.27.name: OISD Blocklist Big
hostlist.27.description: List for blocking ads and trackers. Prioritizes functionality over blocking. Risks of incorrect blocking are higher than in the small version of OISD Blocklist.

hostlist.29.name: CHN: AdRules DNS List
hostlist.29.description: List for blocking ads in the Chinese region

hostlist.30.name: Phishing URL Blocklist (PhishTank and OpenPhish)
hostlist.30.description: Blocklist of phishing websites, based on PhishTank and OpenPhish lists

hostlist.31.name: Stalkerware Indicators List
hostlist.31.description: Indicators of compromise on Stalkerware applications for Android and iOS.

hostlist.32.name: The NoTracking blocklist
hostlist.32.description: The NoTracking blocklist is a DNS based filter list for blocking ads, malware, phishing and other online garbage.

hostlist.34.name: HaGeZi's Normal Blocklist
hostlist.34.description: Broom - Cleans the Internet and protects your privacy! Blocks Ads, Affiliate, Tracking, Metrics, Telemetry, Phishing, Malware, Scam, Fake, Coins and other Crap.

hostlist.36.name: LIT: EasyList Lithuania
hostlist.36.description: This is a (currently pretty small and not much tested) version of EasyList Lithuania designed for use with domains-based tools.

hostlist.37.name: No Google
hostlist.37.description: Completely blocks all Google-related domains (including YouTube).

hostlist.38.name: 1Hosts (mini)
hostlist.38.description: List for blocking pesky ads, trackers, and malware. Lenient version: unblocks a number of ads & trackers for in-app rewards, anti-AdBlock, etc.

hostlist.39.name: Dandelion Sprout's Anti Push Notifications
hostlist.39.description: Aims to remove push notifications on sites. Combines eligible rules from AdGuard Popups Filter's anti-push sections and Fanboy's Notifications Blocking List.

hostlist.40.name: TUR: Turkish Ad Hosts
hostlist.40.description: Necessary hosts file to block tracking and possibly advertising networks in commonly used mobile apps (and possibly web pages) in Turkey.

hostlist.41.name: POL: CERT Polska List of malicious domains
hostlist.41.description: CERT Polska deals with incidents and threats originating or aiming at systems in the .pl domain or connected to NASK's or other Polish Internet provider's network.

hostlist.42.name: ShadowWhisperer's Malware List
hostlist.42.description: Malicious Sites, PUPs, Malware, Browser Hijackers, Phishing Sites

hostlist.43.name: ISR: EasyList Hebrew
hostlist.43.description: List for blocking ads in Hebrew.

hostlist.44.name: HaGeZi's Threat Intelligence Feeds
hostlist.44.description: Increases security significantly! Blocks Malware, Cryptojacking, Spam, Scam and Phishing.

hostlist.45.name: HaGeZi's Allowlist Referral
hostlist.45.description: This list unblocks affiliate & tracking referral links that appear in mails, search results etc.

hostlist.46.name: HaGeZi's Anti-Piracy Blocklist
hostlist.46.description: Blocks websites and services that are mainly used for illegal distribution of copyrighted content.

hostlist.48.name: HaGeZi's Pro Blocklist
hostlist.48.description: Big broom - Cleans the Internet and protects your privacy! Blocks Ads, Affiliate, Tracking, Metrics, Telemetry, Phishing, Malware, Scam, Fake, Coins and other Crap.

hostlist.49.name: HaGeZi's Ultimate Blocklist
hostlist.49.description: Ultimate Sweeper - Strictly cleans the Internet and protects your privacy! Blocks Ads, Affiliate, Tracking (+Referral), Metrics, Telemetry, Phishing, Malware, Scam, Free Hoster, Fake, Coins and other Crap.

hostlist.50.name: uBlock₀ filters – Badware risks
hostlist.50.description: For sites documented to put users at risk of installing adware/crapware/malware, having login credentials stolen, etc. The purpose is to at least ensure a user is warned of the risks ahead.

hostlist.51.name: HaGeZi's Pro++ Blocklist
hostlist.51.description: Sweeper - Aggressive cleans the Internet and protects your privacy! Blocks Ads, Affiliate, Tracking, Metrics, Telemetry, Phishing, Malware, Scam, Fake, Coins and other Crap.

hostlist.52.name: HaGeZi's Encrypted DNS/VPN/TOR/Proxy Bypass
hostlist.52.description: Prevents methods to bypass your DNS, blocks encrypted DNS, VPN, TOR, and proxies. Prevention of bypassing is not guaranteed.

hostlist.53.name: AWAvenue Ads Rule
hostlist.53.description: Uses Adblock syntax to fight against various advertising SDKs in Android apps on the network level, preventing them from loading.

hostlist.54.name: HaGeZi's DynDNS Blocklist
hostlist.54.description: Blocks dynamic DNS services to protect against malicious use in phishing campaigns and others.

hostlist.55.name: HaGeZi's Badware Hoster Blocklist
hostlist.55.description: Blocks known free hosters that also host badware via user content to prevent the use of these hosters for malicious purposes.

hostlist.56.name: HaGeZi's The World's Most Abused TLDs
hostlist.56.description: The Top Most Abused Top Level Domains, merged from HaGeZi, Yokoffing, DandelionSprout and SpamHAUS.

hostlist.60.description: Blocks Xiaomi native broadband trackers that track your activity.
